creator: calixte.denizet@ac-rennes.fr
text:
Created attachment 25236
Patch obtained with the command git diff

Hi all,

I wrote a little patch to check if a shape must be clipped in the generated PS.
This checking is added before drawing a shape, so the size of the generated ps is automatically divide by 2.

Calixte

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text: Applied with rev 949522 (http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=949522&view=rev). Thanks for the patch! I've done a few tests and they look good. Of course, the clipping rectangle is still generated too often (i.e. for each graphical element).

Hello Jeremias,

Thanks to you... The size of the ps files I generated is divide by 3 !

When do you think that a new release will come ?

Calixte
creator: calixte.denizet@ac-rennes.fr
